CosTech was established in 1977 as a small Crown & Bridge lab for a handful of local dentists in Kent. Our excellent service, consistent quality and competitive pricing kept us in high demand and allowed us to grow steadily. Long story short, we now provide a full laboratory service, with separate departments for NHS & Private work, delivering to hundreds of dental practices across the UK.

You can expect a punctual turnaround on your work and transparent pricing so there are no “surprises”. We also pride ourselves on excellent communication. The most time-saving way to get in touch is via our online portal, where you can also track cases and their fees, raise queries and download patient statements.
